sentences.sContent: All of us ought to go.
I think I ought to cut in on what they are doing.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think I ought to cut in on what they are doing.
sentences.sCn: 我认为对他们现在干的事我应当进行干预。

sentences.sContent: You ought to be ashamed of your foolish behaviour.
sentences.sContent_eng: You ought to be ashamed of your foolish behaviour.
sentences.sCn: 你应当为自己的愚蠢行为而感到羞耻。
